title: Screenager
content:
Tell me what you see..   
It works like a display one, like Groobit?   
   
   
 ![screenager.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20150424030138im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/781.gif)
author: Miguel Hernandez

comments.content:
Miguel,   
   
I see a need for one extra   
pixel space between letters.   
   
I see a '4' that looks like   
a '9'.   
   
I see another useful and   
unique pixel font.   
   
Stephen
